title: Integration Strategy Decision Flowchart
description: Interactive decision tree for choosing integration techniques based on integrand structure. Features hover explanations, click-through worked examples, path highlighting, and a mini-quiz.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Mathematics
Calculus
Integration
Integral Techniques
Decision Trees
prerequisites: Knowledge of derivative rules (for recognizing u-substitution)

buttons.name: Mini-Quiz
buttons.description: Launches a 5-question quiz where students identify the correct integration technique by clicking on the flowchart

buttons.name: Reset
buttons.description: Clears all highlighting and returns to the default view

interactions.name: Hover
interactions.description: Hover over any node to see a detailed explanation in the side panel

interactions.name: Click
interactions.description: Click an action node to see a worked example and highlight the decision path
